title: Park Bosphorus Hotel Istanbul - the best for 'Bleisure'
text:
Park Bosphorus Hotel Istanbul - the best for 'Bleisure' Park Bosphorus Hotel Istanbul - the best for 'Bleisure' Details Category: Hotel   11:45 Park Bosphorus Hotel Istanbul re-opened in October 2013 following an extensive refurbishment positioning it as one of the best located hotels in Istanbul that wows both business and leisure travellers. It is one of the most luxurious hotels in the city promising a variety of luxury facilities and 5 star service. 
Only 30km from Ataturk International Airport, the hotel is in the heart of Istanbul and only a short walk to the business districts such as Levent, Maslak, 4. Levent, Şișli, Mecidiyeköy, Kozyatağı, Altunizade and Ümraniye and all large global offices. The hotel can offer transfer services to and from the hotel making access seamless. It is in the Taksim Gümüşsuyu district, it is only a stones through to the famous Taksim Square, Metro Station and Istiklal Street and close to key sought after destinations, including Sultanahmet, Beyoglu, Galata, Cihangir, Karaköy and the boutique and café lined Nişantaşı neighbourhood. Designed with business travellers in mind, it boasts a wide range of meeting and event facilities with 19 specially designed meeting rooms, each equipped with the latest technology, including 3 dividable meeting rooms. There is a Business Centre at the hotel and throughout guests have access to cable and wireless internet. Guests are able to use the express dry cleaning services as well as the express check-in services on each floor. There is an Executive Lounge that can be accessed by guests staying on the Executive Floor. Here guests can utilise the benefits and privileges of the Executive Lounge on a complimentary basis. There is also a special Butler Service which takes the stress out of most decisions. The 805 sq.m Istanbul Ballroom can be divided into two areas and connects to the car park, a 380 sq.m lounge area and Café Jardin with outdoor terrace and Botanic Garden area. It offers unrivalled hospitality and stunning Bosphorus views. The hotel comprises of 385 rooms including 28 suites ranging from 35-115 sq.m with a choice of Bosphorus, or city views, including the Presidential Suite, which is the largest in Turkey. It also has the largest outdoor hotel terrace (4,500 sq.m) in Turkey, as well as in all of Europe, offering stunning 360 degree views of the city and Bosphorus. Extravagantly designed food and beverage outlets serve a variety of international cuisine, from the refined and spicy tastes of Ottoman dishes to delicious Western fare. Following a hard day’s work, guests can use Park Bosphorus Hotel Istanbul as the ultimate launch pad to explore some of the most popular attractions in the city or for those looking to stay active whilst on business or to simply unwind the hotel has an impressive 8,500 sq.m state-of-the-art CVK Safira Spa & Fitness & Wellness Centre with exclusive VIP areas and an indoor pool with a retractable roof. It’s the largest spa in a hotel in Europe and one of the best places to experience the traditional Turkish Hammam. Stay at Park Bosphorus Hotel Istanbul in a Superior King Room from £128 (EUR180) per room per night inclusive of breakfast.
